comment.author: 22139308@N03
comment._content: Sport. Olympic Games 1928 Amsterdam, Netherlands. Gas fitters at work at the Olympic Stadium.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: An Olympic flame was lit at the 1928 games for the first time. I suppose these chaps may have been responsibile for the gas supply to the flame. www.olympic.org/uk/games/past/index_uk.asp?OLGT=1&OLG...

comment.author: 26022992@N07
comment._content: Gas fitters had not been advised beforehand about the width of the door.
